1.12.2.1.12.2-2.0.2.0: Added Comforts compatibility thanks to TheIllusiveC4.
1.12.2.1.12.2-2.0.0.0:
Removed the clear chat keybind, short gamemode commands and the option to replace NuclearCraft Sulfur drops with Thermal Foundation Sulfur.
Major refactor. 1.10 and 1.11 support has been removed.
Improved the configuration. There are now fewer options that require a Minecraft restart. Resetting the configuration is recommended, but not required.
Added options to configure the maximum hunger and saturation levels.
Added an option to require full cubes for mob spawns.
Several bug fixes, improvements and optimizations.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.19.1.0:
The "ding" sound can now be disabled without crashing.
Added support for multiple world join "ding" sounds.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.19.0.0:
Reorganized the configuration.
The stepup and FoV change toggle states are now stored on disk.
Added the disconnect command.
Removed the dimension unloader.
Fixed bugs.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.18.3.0:
Added auto jump.
Fixed a crash related to the configuration.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.18.2.0:
Fixed auto third person.
Minor tweaks.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.18.1.0: Added the option to allow skeleton arrows to be picked up (disabled by default).
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.18.0.1:
Fixed keybinds.
Fixed /give's order of precedence.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.18.0.0:
Major code cleanup.
Bug fixes.
Removed log filters.
Multiple "ding" sounds are now supported.
Added a keybind to toggle FoV changes.
/give now supports ore dictionary names prefixed by "ore:".
Players now have a configurable head drop chance.
Added auto third person.
Unused dimensions can now be automatically unloaded.
Cumulative anvil costs can now be disabled.
Added shortened gamemode commands.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.17.1.0:
Added the config option to replace NuclearCraft Sulfur drops with Thermal Foundation Sulfur.
Added ocean floor worldgen (disabled by default).
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.17.0.1: Fixed a crash relating to pet protection.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.17.0.0:
Added clear water.
Added pet protection.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.16.0.0:
Changed 'hunger' to 'respawn' in the configuration.
Added death punishments if keepInventory is true.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.15.0.0:
Improved the configuration.
Added configuration options for the time of day overlay.
Added default world borders.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.14.1.1: Fixed a typo in the time of day overlay.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.14.1.0: Added a config option to enable/disable the time of day overlay.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.14.0.0:
The jar is now signed properly.
Added options to disable the Wither and Ender Dragon broadcast sounds.
Fixed issues with the time of day overlay.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.13.0.0:
The RandomTweaks jar is now signed.
Added pack.mcmeta.
Added customizable player attack speed.
The time of day overlay no longer draws over the debug menu.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.12.0.0:
Miscellaneous fixes and tweaks.
Added a 'noclip' keybind.
Fixed some issues with the Void and Void Islands world types.
The sleep tweaks are now automatically disabled if Comforts is installed.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.11.0.1:
Fixed a crash related to the time of day overlay.
Fixed the void world spawn block.
Fixed some issues with the sleep tweaks.
1.12.2.1.12.2-1.11.0.0:
Fixed inconsistencies between the 1.10/1.11 and 1.12 versions. This should make it much easier to update for both versions.
Cleaned up the code.
1.12.2.1.12.1-1.10.0.1:
Fixed a crash related to creating configurations.
Made sure Void Islands spawn points are valid.
Fixed the configuration GUI.
1.12.2.1.12.1-1.10.0.0:
Changed the versioning scheme.
Changed the location of logfilters.json.
Added /rtreloadclient.

1.11.2.1.11.2-1.10.0.0:
Changed the location of logfilters.json.
Added /rtreloadclient.
Fixed client crash on 1.10.2.
Fixed the Clear Chat keybind on 1.10.2.
Fixed /rtreload on 1.10.2.
Fixed a crash in the development environment.
1.11.2.1.11.2-1.9.0.1:
Fixed all issues in 1.11.2-1.9.0.0.
Added a Clear Chat keybind.
1.11.2.1.11.2-1.9.0.0:
Redid the configuration.
Added Ding.
Removed the voidWorldBlockMeta configuration option.
Improved default gamerules gamemode/world type parsing.
Fixed the configuration GUI.
1.11.2.1.11.2-1.8.0.4:
Fixed the "Could not set cape" error message.
Fixed configuration location.
Fixed URLs for versions.json and contributors.txt.
Fixed some issues with log filters.
1.11.2.1.11.2-1.8.0.2:
Fixed a crash that occurs if a player tries to sleep while there is no block at that location (e.g. a Sleeping Bag).
Fixed a crash that occurs when a logger message has a Throwable with a null message.
1.11.2.1.11.2-1.8.0.1:
Fixed the /give command error in 1.10.2 for real this time.
Fixed /hunger using the hunger level as the saturation level.
Fixed the "You may not rest now, the bed is too far away" message not showing up on 1.10.2.
1.11.2.1.11.2-1.8.0.0:
Fixed world types still showing up when disabled in the configuration.
Cleaned up code.
The Realistic world type is now disabled if Quark is installed (configurable).
Miscellaneous bug fixes.
Added the log filter system.
Added the Spawn Eggs creative tab.
1.11.2.1.11.2-1.7.0.3: Fixed yet another crash due to me accidentally including code that I wasn't meant to. 1.7.0.0 messed up everything...
1.11.2.1.11.2-1.7.0.2: Fixed crash on the physical server. My fault for not testing server-sided.
1.11.2.1.11.2-1.7.0.1: Fixed general tweaks not working or being registered in the configuration.
1.11.2.1.11.2-1.7.0.0:
Fixed compatibility with Guide-API and probably several other mods.
Added the Void Islands world type.
/give now accepts amounts higher than 64.
Redid the configuration system which fixes several issues. This will probably mess with your configuration.
1.11.2.1.11.2-1.6.0.0:
/give now accepts integer IDs.
New default squid spawn limit radius is 64.
Added a configuration GUI and an option to disable contributor capes.
1.11.2.1.11.2-1.5.0.0:
Added /rtreload.
Now automatically disables Surge's pigman sleep fix if Surge is installed.
Added Realistic and Void world types.
1.11.2.1.11.2-1.4.0.0:
Added more options for hunger resetting on respawn.
Added specific world types in the default gamerules.
Multiple game modes and world types can now be specified in the default gamerules.
1.11.2.1.11.2-1.3.0.0:
Cleaned up some code.
Fixed some bugs.
Added ocelot healing.
Added sleep tweaks.
1.11.2.1.11.2-1.2.0.0:
Redid configuration system.
Added the bucket creative tab tweak and the squid spawning tweaks.
1.11.2.1.11.2-1.1.0.0: Added default gamerules, a /deletegamerule command, a /hunger command, a configuration and a hunger reset toggle. Also fixed an issue with the Roman numerals.
1.11.2.1.11.2-1.0.0.1:
Added German translation.
Now checks the localizations for values before generating Roman numerals.

Added the disconnect command.
Removed the dimension unloader.
Fixed bugs.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.18.3.0:
Added auto jump.
Fixed a crash related to the configuration.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.18.2.0:
Fixed auto third person.
Minor tweaks.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.18.1.0: Added the option to allow skeleton arrows to be picked up (disabled by default).
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.18.0.1:
Fixed keybinds.
Fixed /give's order of precedence.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.18.0.0:
Major code cleanup.
Bug fixes, including 1.10 and 1.11-specific fixes.
Removed log filters.
Multiple "ding" sounds are now supported.
Added a keybind to toggle FoV changes.
/give now supports ore dictionary names prefixed by "ore:".
Players now have a configurable head drop chance.
Added auto third person.
Unused dimensions can now be automatically unloaded.
Cumulative anvil costs can now be disabled.
Added shortened gamemode commands.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.17.1.0:
Added the config option to replace NuclearCraft Sulfur drops with Thermal Foundation Sulfur.
Added ocean floor worldgen (disabled by default).
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.17.0.1: Fixed a crash relating to pet protection.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.17.0.0:
Added clear water.
Added pet protection.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.16.0.0:
Changed 'hunger' to 'respawn' in the configuration.
Added death punishments if keepInventory is true.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.15.0.0:
Improved the configuration.
Added configuration options for the time of day overlay.
Added default world borders.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.14.1.1: Fixed a typo in the time of day overlay.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.14.1.0: Added a config option to enable/disable the time of day overlay.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.14.0.0:
The jar is now signed properly.
Added options to disable the Wither and Ender Dragon broadcast sounds.
Fixed issues with the time of day overlay.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.13.0.0:
The RandomTweaks jar is now signed.
Added pack.mcmeta.
Added customizable player attack speed.
The time of day overlay no longer draws over the debug menu.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.12.0.0:
Miscellaneous fixes and tweaks.
Fixed 1.10 compatibility.
Added a 'noclip' keybind.
Fixed some issues with the Void and Void Islands world types.
The sleep tweaks are now automatically disabled if Comforts is installed.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.11.0.1:
Fixed a crash related to the time of day overlay.
Fixed the void world spawn block.
Fixed some issues with the sleep tweaks.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.11.0.0:
Fixed inconsistencies between the 1.10/1.11 and 1.12 versions. This should make it much easier to update for both versions.
Cleaned up the code.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.10.0.1:
Fixed a crash related to creating configurations.
Made sure Void Islands spawn points are valid.
Fixed the configuration GUI.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.10.0.0:
Changed the location of logfilters.json.
Added /rtreloadclient.
Fixed client crash on 1.10.2.
Fixed the Clear Chat keybind on 1.10.2.
Fixed /rtreload on 1.10.2.
Fixed a crash in the development environment.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.9.0.1:
Fixed all issues in 1.11.2-1.9.0.0.
Added a Clear Chat keybind.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.9.0.0:
Redid the configuration.
Added Ding.
Removed the voidWorldBlockMeta configuration option.
Improved default gamerules gamemode/world type parsing.
Fixed the configuration GUI.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.8.0.4:
Fixed the "Could not set cape" error message.
Fixed configuration location.
Fixed URLs for versions.json and contributors.txt.
Fixed some issues with log filters.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.8.0.2:
Fixed a crash that occurs if a player tries to sleep while there is no block at that location (e.g. a Sleeping Bag).
Fixed a crash that occurs when a logger message has a Throwable with a null message.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.8.0.1:
Fixed the /give command error in 1.10.2 for real this time.
Fixed /hunger using the hunger level as the saturation level.
Fixed the "You may not rest now, the bed is too far away" message not showing up on 1.10.2.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.8.0.0:
Fixed world types still showing up when disabled in the configuration.
Cleaned up code.
The Realistic world type is now disabled if Quark is installed (configurable).
Miscellaneous bug fixes.
Added the log filter system.
Added the Spawn Eggs creative tab.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.7.0.3: Fixed yet another crash due to me accidentally including code that I wasn't meant to. 1.7.0.0 messed up everything...
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.7.0.2: Fixed crash on the physical server. My fault for not testing server-sided.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.7.0.1: Fixed general tweaks not working or being registered in the configuration.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.7.0.0:
Fixed compatibility with Guide-API and probably several other mods.
Added the Void Islands world type.
/give now accepts amounts higher than 64.
Redid the configuration system which fixes several issues. This will probably mess with your configuration.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.6.0.0:
/give now accepts integer IDs.
New default squid spawn limit radius is 64.
Aded a configuration GUI and an option to disable contributor capes.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.5.0.0:
Added /rtreload.
Now automatically disables Surge's pigman sleep fix if Surge is installed.
Added Realistic and Void world types.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.4.0.0:
Added more options for hunger resetting on respawn.
Added specific world types in the default gamerules.
Multiple game modes and world types can now be specified in the default gamerules.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.3.0.0:
Cleaned up some code.
Fixed some bugs.
Added ocelot healing.
Added sleep tweaks.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.2.0.0:
Redid configuration system.
Added the bucket creative tab tweak and the squid spawning tweaks.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.1.0.0: Added default gamerules, a /deletegamerule command, a /hunger command, a configuration and a hunger reset toggle. Also fixed an issue with the Roman numerals.
1.10.2.1.11.2-1.0.0.1:
Added German translation.
Now checks the localizations for values before generating Roman numerals.
